Row.Text: Banquet
A lavish banquet is upcoming and, as its host, we are asked to decide how best to serve our guests: Food, or Drink.
Drink! No one dislikes drink.
Treat them to a plethora of exotic dishes!
Serve them something simple. Bread perhaps.
The Capital begins celebrating [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day' for 10 turns and become known as '[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]the Drunkard[ENDCOLOR].'
The Capital begins celebrating [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day' for 10 turns and become known as '[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]the Fat[ENDCOLOR].'
The Capital begins celebrating [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day' for 5 turns.
After drinking copious amounts of alcohol, we have earned the name: {3_LeaderDesc} the Drunkard!
After eating copious amounts of food, we have earned the name: {3_LeaderDesc} the Fat!
the Drunkard
Nothing
the Fat
Nothing
Defamation
A boisterous but popular historian has been criticizing our rule, accusing us of being needlessly oppressive.
We'll show him needless oppression!
We should invite him to speak his concerns to us.
We'll ignore this issue.
The Capital's [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance Sentiment is reset and become known as '[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]the Bad[ENDCOLOR].'
+{2_Num} and become known as [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]the Good[ENDCOLOR].'
After imprisoning a historian critical of our rule, we have earned the name: {3_LeaderDesc} the Bad!
After inviting a historian to express his concerns about our rule, we have earned the name: {3_LeaderDesc} the Good!
the Bad
Nothing
the Good
Nothing
After imprisoning a historian critical of their rule, {3_LeaderDesc} of {1_CivName} has become known as 'the Bad!'
After inviting a historian to express his concerns about their rule, {3_LeaderDesc} of {1_CivName} has become known as 'the Good!'
Devout Catholic
Catholic Priests throughout the world are in agreement: we are a beacon of devotion.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+{3_Num} and become known as '[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]the Catholic[ENDCOLOR].'
the Catholic
Nothing
Given our example as a devoted Catholic, we have earned the name: {3_LeaderDesc} the Catholic!
Given their example as a devoted Catholic, {3_LeaderDesc} of {1_CivName} has become known as 'the Catholic!'
Execution
We have learned that a criminal scheduled to be executed may be innocent. However, in order to test this innocence, we would need more time than we have.
Execute them anyway. Our justice system cannot appear weak.
Then they must be declared innocent until proven otherwise.
The Capital enters [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance for 1 turn, and begins celebrating [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day' for 15 turns, and become known as '[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]the Fair[ENDCOLOR].'
We have allowed the execution of a potentially innocent criminal to proceed.
After staying the execution of a potentially innocent criminal, we have earned the name: {3_LeaderDesc} the Fair!
The execution of a potentially innocent criminal has been stayed by {3_LeaderDesc} of {1_CivName}, earning them the epithet 'the Fair!'
Execution
The criminal whose execution we had stayed has turned out to be guilty after all![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{1_Num}.
Execution
The criminal whose execution we had stayed has been found to have committed suicide, attesting to their guilt after all![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{1_Num}.
Execution
The criminal whose execution we did not stay has turned out to be innocent after all![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{1_Num}.
Execution
The criminal whose execution we had stayed has turned out to be innocent after all![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+{2_Num}.
Execution
Minor protests have been staged over the innocence of the criminal whose execution we did not stay.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+{3_Num} [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance Sentiment.
Execution
The family of the criminal whose execution we had stayed has written to us a letter of thanks.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+{2_Num}.
Rumours
Our reluctance to take a spouse has caused concern within the government. Some have even begun to spin rumours...
We cannot continue this lie.
How dare they? We are a beacon of virtue!
We have simply yet to find one deserving of us.
+{2_Num} and become known as '[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]the Homosexual[ENDCOLOR].'
+{2_Num} and become known as '[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]the Chaste[ENDCOLOR].'
After confessing to our affairs with the same sex, we have earned the name: {3_LeaderDesc} the Homosexual!
After confessing to our abstinence from sex, we have earned the name: {3_LeaderDesc} the Chaste!
After confessing to their affairs with the same sex, {3_LeaderDesc} of {1_CivName} has become known as 'the Homosexual!'
After confessing to their abstinence from sex, {3_LeaderDesc} of {1_CivName} has become known as 'the Chaste!'
Treasure Cache
Whilst in the process of expanding one of our residences, we have uncovered what appears to be an assortment of ancient treasures!
We should put these on display for people to see.
Into our treasury you go!
Well these would look best on us!
+{2_Num} and become known as '[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]the Fortunate[ENDCOLOR].'
+{2_Num} and become known as '[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]the Fortunate[ENDCOLOR].'
After the discovery of a cache of treasures, we have earned the name: {3_LeaderDesc} the Fortunate!
After the discovery of a cache of treasures, we have earned the name: {3_LeaderDesc} the Fortunate!
After the discovery of a cache of valueable treasures, {3_LeaderDesc} of {1_CivName} has you become known as 'the Fortunate!'
